籤詩版本二:
Ku kasance masu ladabi da ladabi lokacin shiga da fita, ku kasance masu aminci da rikon amana, kuma ku yi biyayya da maganarku.
Hankali ba shi da tabbas kuma shiru, jajayen rana mai haske yana tsakiyar
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana wakiltar hoton jajayen rana da ke haskakawa a sararin sama.
Komai yana tafiya kamar yadda aka tsara.
解曰: Babu wani abu a zuciya. Ruwan kaka a bayyane yake. Babu bukatar shakka. Abubuwa suna faruwa a zahiri.
籤詩故事一:
◇Taoyuan ya rantse 'yan'uwantaka
A ƙarshen daular Han ta Gabas, duniya ta kasance cikin rudani, kuma barayin rawaya rawaya sun haifar da hargitsi a ko'ina.
Liu Bei, Guan Yu da Zhang Fei, mutane uku masu kyawawan akida, suna da manufa iri daya, kuma sun dogara ga juna a cikin maganganunsu da ayyukansu, don cimma manufar yin babban aiki tare, sun zabi lokacin da furannin peach ke cika furanni. , kuma sun gudanar da wani biki a lambun furen peach (yanzu garin Songlindian, birnin Zhuozhou, lardin Hebei) sun zama abokan juna kan shan giya, sun yi rantsuwa zuwa sama, sun sha wahala, sun sha wahala, sun yi tarayya da juna, sun yi tarayya da albarka, tare da hadin gwiwa sun gane kyawawan abubuwa. manufa ta farfado da daular Han. Su ukun sun zama 'yan'uwa da aka rantse, a watan Maris ne kuma furannin peach ya yi fure, wanda aka fi sani da "'yan'uwa uku a cikin lambun peach".
聖意: Tsaron gida, dukiya, dukiya, matsalolin mu'amala, aure, haɗari, masu tafiya a ƙasa suna tare gonaki, tsutsotsi, dabbobi, bace, ƙara, hasara, ƙaura, masu ra'ayin mazan jiya, asarar dukiya, rashin lafiya, kafawa, aika zuwa kabarin dutse, sa'a.
第X籤: Talatin da hudu sun ci cacar caca (lotting)
